## VirtualListProps.itemKey property

Function that defines the key to use for each item given item index and value of [VirtualBaseProps.itemData](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualbaseprops.itemdata.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
itemKey?: (index: number, data: unknown) => React.Key;
```
